siteDescription:
This site is a tool for students at NTNU to plan and document their exchange studies. 

 Here you can see which courses other students have taken during their exchange, and you can create your own plan for your exchange.
mobileWarning: This site is not optimized for mobile devices. Please use a computer or tablet for the best experience.
newFeature:
Support for UiO (Oslo), UiB (Bergen), UiS (Stavanger), and UiT (Troms√∏) is now added! 
Select your university when you create your exchange.
